azurerm_database_migration_project.description: Manage Azure Database Migration Project instance.

name.description: Specify the name of the database migration project. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

service_name.description: Name of the database migration service where resource belongs to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group in which to create the database migration project. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

source_platform.description: The platform type of the migration source. Currently only support: `SQL`(on-premises SQL Server). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

target_platform.description: The platform type of the migration target. Currently only support: `SQLDB`(Azure SQL Database). Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assigned to the resource.

id.description: The ID of Database Migration Project.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management API.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management API.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management API.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management API.
